credit_line: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
title: Designs for two frames
medium: Pen and black ink, traces of graphite, brush and wash, on white laid paper
description: Horizontal rectangle. At left, oval plaque surrounded by a frame of scrollwork in the shape of a shield with a shell on top, a garland across top of mirror, leafy elements suspended from either side. At right, a plaque in the shape of a shield, scrollwork frame from garlands are suspended, a volute at top. A pinecone is suspended at bottom.
name: drawing
